devdoc.author: RabbitHole.gg
devdoc.details: This contract is used to create quests and mint receipts

createQuest(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Create an erc20 quest, only accounts with the CREATE_QUEST_ROLE can create quests

params.contractType_: Deprecated, it was used when we had 1155 reward support
params.endTime_: The end time of the quest
params.rewardAmount_: The reward amount for an erc20 quest
params.rewardTokenAddress_: The contract address of the reward token
params.startTime_: The start time of the quest
params.totalParticipants_: The total amount of participants (accounts) the quest will have

createQuestAndQueue(address,uint256,uint.details: Create an erc20 quest and start it at the same time. The function will transfer the reward amount to the quest contractonly accounts with the CREATE_QUEST_ROLE can create quests

params.discountTokenId_: The id of the discount token
params.endTime_: The end time of the quest
params.jsonSpecCID: The CID of the JSON spec for the quest
params.rewardAmount_: The reward amount for an erc20 quest
params.rewardTokenAddress_: The contract address of the reward token
params.startTime_: The start time of the quest
params.totalParticipants_: The total amount of participants (accounts) the quest will have

getAddressMinted(string,address).details: return status of whether an address has minted a receipt for a quest

getMintFeeRecipient().details: get the mintFeeRecipient return the protocol fee recipient if the mint fee recipient is not set

getNumberMinted(string).details: return the number of minted receipts for a quest

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

mintReceipt(string,bytes32,bytes).details: mint a RabbitHole Receipt. Note: this contract must be set as Minter on the receipt contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

questInfo(string).details: return data in the quest struct for a questId

recoverSigner(bytes32,bytes).details: recover the signer from a hash and signature

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.claimSignerAddress_: The address of the claim signer

params.erc20QuestAddress_: The address of the erc20 quest

params.mintFeeRecipient_: The address of the mint fee recipient

params.protocolFeeRecipient_: The address of the protocol fee recipient

params.rabbitholeReceiptContract_: The address of the rabbithole receipt contract

setRewardAllowlistAddress(address,bool).details: set or remave a contract address to be used as a reward

params.allowed_: Whether the contract address is allowed or not

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: QuestFactory

setQuestFee(uint16).notice: the quest fee should be in Basis Point units
